author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway on Wednesday revoked the suspension of seven of the nine women employees who barged into the office of a senior railway official last week.

Official sources said following the incident on March 24, all nine women who forced their way into the office of Chief Commercial Manager Ajeet Saxena were suspended. Seven of them had tendered their apology, following which their suspension was revoked, officials added.
title: Suspension of 7 rail staff revoked
